message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price!

While I appreciate your offer, $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. This is a fair price for both of us, as it's above your product's worth to you and within my limit.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price that's closer to my minimum value, but still a good deal for you.
While I appreciate your willingness to compromise, $16,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $13,000. It's a fair price that allows us both to make a good deal.
